content: to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst round 16 a first round diamond flower offset 2 chain 3 and skip the next stitch construct round as per v4 pattern round 10 3 double_crochet in each of the next seven stitches including the 1 chain space round 16 b double_crochet in all stitches around 4 chain 3 and skip the next stitch 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst 5 repeat steps 3 and 4 eight times 2 double_crochet in each of the next 2 dcs 6 double_crochet in each of the next six stitches including the 1 chain space 3 double_crochet over chain space 7 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 4 double_crochet in each of next 7 dcs stitch count 70 double_crochet and 10 chain 3 space 5 double_crochet over chain space round 14 second round diamond flower 6 repeat steps 4 and 5 eight times 1 to commence the round turn the work to wrong side and slip_stitch twice into each of 7 double_crochet in each of the last 4 dcs the second and third stitches now turn work back to right side and work a stndst 8 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 in same stitch as the last slip_stitch was made the stndst will have been made in a double_crochet stitch count 80 that is three stitches clockwise from a 3 chain space round 17 second round diamond flower offset 2 chain 3 and skip the next 2 double_crochet stitches and first chain of the next previous round 3 chain construct round as per v4 pattern round 11 3 slip_stitch in the second middle chain of the previous round 3 chain 4 3 chain and skip the third chain of the previous round 3 chain and the next 2 double_crochet stitches round 18 third round diamond flower offset 5 double_crochet in each of the next three stitches construct round as per v4 pattern round 12 6 chain 3 and skip the next 2 double_crochet stitches and first chain of the next previous round 3 chain page | 10 round 19 double_crochet in all stitches around variant 5 v5 messy hair pony tail/ bun beanie image 6 1 to commence the round stndst in the previous round stndst 2 double_crochet in each of the next 4 dcs you will need a small round elastic hair band or double a regular sized hair elastic as i 3 double_crochet over chain space have done for the beanie in image 6 4 double_crochet in each of next 7 dcs commence with joining the yarn around the hair elastic then 2 chain and then work 5 double_crochet over chain space either 20 or 30 dcs over the hair elastic depending on the size of the hair elastic so 6 repeat steps 4 and 5 eight times that the entire elastic is covered slip_stitch into the first double_crochet skip the 2 chain 7 double_crochet in each of the last 2 dcs if 20
